title: Mariska Hargitay & Christopher Meloni | Judge Says Trump Coup Likely a Crime; Ginni Thomas and Ted Cruz Implicated: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at a federal judge saying that Trump’s attempted coup was likely a crime as bombshell new reports reveal that both Ted Cruz and the wife of Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas were closely involved.

Mariska Hargitay and Christopher Meloni talk about their hardcore loyal fanbase, their initial reactions to the first Law & Order: SVU script and what their auditions were like.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
